summary: THE VEHICLE EXPERIENCED SUDDEN ACCELERATION, WHEN THE BRAKES WERE APPLIED.  *JB  THE WAS NO WAY TO ENGAGE THE BRAKE PEDAL AND THE ACCELERATOR PEDAL AT THE SAME TIME, AND WAS TRAVELING AT A LOW SPEED WHEN THE BRAKE WAS ENGAGED.  THE ENGINE HAD GONE UP TO OVER 3K RPM'S.  THE DEALER COULDN'T DUPLICATE.  SCC
